pullRequest.title: Add integration test for autograder plugin
pullRequest.bodyText: Ich hätte gerne eine kurze Rückmeldung, ob es in die richtige Richtung geht?

commit.message:
Bump echarts-api from 4.6.0-9 to 4.6.0-10

Bumps [echarts-api](https://github.com/jenkinsci/echarts-api-plugin) from 4.6.0-9 to 4.6.0-10.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/jenkinsci/echarts-api-plugin/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/jenkinsci/echarts-api-plugin/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/jenkinsci/echarts-api-plugin/compare/echarts-api-4.6.0-9...echarts-api-4.6.0-10)

Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>

Bump bootstrap4-api from 4.4.1-13 to 4.4.1-14

Bumps [bootstrap4-api](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bootstrap4-api-plugin) from 4.4.1-13 to 4.4.1-14.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bootstrap4-api-plugin/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bootstrap4-api-plugin/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bootstrap4-api-plugin/compare/bootstrap4-api-4.4.1-13...bootstrap4-api-4.4.1-14)

Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>
Add initial API integration test

Merge pull request #462 from jenkinsci/dependabot/maven/io.jenkins.plugins-bootstrap4-api-4.4.1-14

Bump bootstrap4-api from 4.4.1-13 to 4.4.1-14

Merge pull request #460 from jenkinsci/dependabot/maven/io.jenkins.plugins-echarts-api-4.6.0-10

Bump echarts-api from 4.6.0-9 to 4.6.0-10
Check that action contains the expected score.

Bump bootstrap4-api from 4.4.1-14 to 4.4.1-15

Bumps [bootstrap4-api](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bootstrap4-api-plugin) from 4.4.1-14 to 4.4.1-15.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bootstrap4-api-plugin/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bootstrap4-api-plugin/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/jenkinsci/bootstrap4-api-plugin/compare/bootstrap4-api-4.4.1-14...bootstrap4-api-4.4.1-15)

Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>

Merge pull request #468 from jenkinsci/dependabot/maven/io.jenkins.plugins-bootstrap4-api-4.4.1-15

Bump bootstrap4-api from 4.4.1-14 to 4.4.1-15

Bump analysis-model-api from 8.0.1 to 8.1.0

Bumps [analysis-model-api](https://github.com/jenkinsci/analysis-model) from 8.0.1 to 8.1.0.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/jenkinsci/analysis-model/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/jenkinsci/analysis-model/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/jenkinsci/analysis-model/compare/analysis-model-8.0.1...analysis-model-8.1.0)

Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>
Bump version of analysis-model tests to 8.1.0.
Fix links to warnings plugin native format

Merge pull request #470 from whut/patch-1

Fix links to warnings plugin native format

Fix source code links.

Followup to #470.

Merge pull request #471 from jenkinsci/links

Fix source code links

Merge pull request #469 from jenkinsci/dependabot/maven/io.jenkins.plugins-analysis-model-api-8.1.0

Bump analysis-model-api from 8.0.1 to 8.1.0
Fix plugin path.
Add skipping test

nodes.bodyText: Da wird der Wert von vorher wieder überschrieben?
Hier wäre noch schön, die jeweiligen Results zu holen score.getAnalysisScores(), da sollten ja 3 drin sein. Sonst ist unklar woher die -2 kommt.
Der Test ist nur im Autograding relevant und kann entfernt werden.

commit.message: Merge branch 'autogradingApiITest' of github.com:kosiuk/warnings-ng-plugin
Evaluate all AnalysisScores
Removing java from tests
